sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"人类"之意。
means: man ： 指各时代的全体人类。
mankind ： 集体名词，语体庄重，泛指过去、现在和未来的人类。
humanity ： 书面用词，集合名词，多用于文学作品中，作人类解时，侧重有同情心、理解力和崇高品质。

word_mean: man-machine weather forecast  利用电子计算机在终端显示的信息或加工产品，由预报员根据天气学理论和经验进行修正而作出的预报。
man-machine communica-tion 人通过输入装置给计算机输入各种数据和命令，以进行操纵和控制，而计算机则执行命令和将数据处理的结果及时地显示出来的人机交互过程。

sentence.Network_en: She ran away with a man called McTavish last year.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年，她和一个叫麦克塔维什的男人私奔了。

sentence.Network_en: Nora was deflowered by a man who worked in a soda-water factory.
sentence.Network_cn: 在汽水厂工作的一个男子夺去了诺拉的童贞。

sentence.Network_en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

lj.lj_ly: I'm as ambitious as the next man.
lj.lj_ls: 我像其他人一样有抱负。

jx.jx_en_mean: be the person perfectly suited to a particular requirement or task

lj.lj_ly: for any colouring and perming services, David's your man.
lj.lj_ls: 只要是染发和烫发，戴维是你的最佳人选。

phrase.cizu_name: be man enough to do (或 for)

lj.lj_ly: he has not been man enough to face up to his responsibilities.
lj.lj_ls: 他没有足够的勇气来面对自己要负的责任。

phrase.cizu_name: every man for himself and the devil take the hindm

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)everyone should (or does) look after their own interests rather than considering those of others
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)各人自己照管自己，自顾自

lj.lj_ly: in previous student flats she'd shared, it was every man for himself.
lj.lj_ls: 在她以前住过的学生公寓里，大家都自己顾自己。

lj.lj_ly: full speed ahead and the devil take the hindmost.

phrase.cizu_name: make a man out of someone

jx.jx_en_mean: (of an experience or person) turn a young man into a mature adult
jx.jx_cn_mean: （经历或人）使某人成熟，使某人长大成人

lj.lj_ly: I make men out of them and teach them never to let anyone outsmart them.
lj.lj_ls: 我帮他们走向成熟并教导他们绝不要败给任何人。

lj.lj_ly: the time when families worked in the fields man and boy.
lj.lj_ls: 家家户户终生忙碌于田间的年代。

jx.jx_en_mean: the imagined likeness of a face seen on the surface of a full moon
an ordinary person, often with regard to their opinions, or as distinct from an expert

lj.lj_ly: he had been his eyes and ears in the community, voiced the opinions of the man in the street.
lj.lj_ls: 在社区中他是他的耳目，谈出普通人的见解。

lj.lj_ly: he had been his eyes and ears in the community, voiced the opinions of the man in the street.
lj.lj_ls: 在社区中他是他的耳目，谈出普通人的见解。

jx.jx_en_mean: a man who adheres to what is right or to a high standard of conduct
the male head of a household

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English man(n), (plural) menn (noun), mannian (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch man, German Mann, and Sanskrit manu 'mankind'

encyclopedia.content: 英语含义男人（有时泛指人类） ，复数形式men，多用来形容很有男人味，跟在国家的后面也做XX国人，如English（英格兰）men就是英国人。

entry.def: A man is an adult male human being.

example.ex: He had not expected the young man to reappear before evening...
example.tran: 他没想到这位年轻男子会在黄昏前再次出现。

example.ex: I have always regarded him as a man of integrity.
example.tran: 我一向认为他是个正直的人。

entry.tran: 人，人类（此用法仍有争议）
entry.def: Man and men are sometimes used to refer to all human beings, including both males and females. Some people dislike this use.

example.ex: The chick initially has no fear of man...
example.tran: 小鸡天生并不怕人。

example.ex: Anxiety is modern man's natural state.
example.tran: 焦虑是现代人的自然状态。

entry.def: If you say that a man is, for example, a gambling man or an outdoors man, you mean that he likes gambling or outdoor activities.

example.ex: Are you a gambling man, Mr Graham?...
example.tran: 格雷厄姆先生，你是好赌的人吗?

example.ex: He is a keen outdoors man with a great interest in photography and walking.
example.tran: 他非常喜欢户外运动，酷爱摄影和徒步旅行。

entry.tran: （来自某地的）人；（在某地上过学的）人
entry.def: If you say that a man is, for example, a London man or an Oxford man, you mean that he comes from London or Oxford, or went to university there.

example.ex: ...as the Stockport man collected his winnings...
example.tran: 在那名来自斯托克波特的人收拢他赢的钱的时候

example.ex: Attlee was an  Oxford man.
example.tran: 艾德礼是名牛津学子。

entry.tran: (某公司或组织的男性)职员，代表
entry.def: If you refer to a particular company's or organiza-tion's man, you mean a man who works for or represents that company or organization.

example.ex: ...the Daily Telegraph's man in Abu Dhabi.
example.tran: 《每日电讯报》驻阿布扎比的记者

example.ex: ...America's man at the United Nations.
example.tran: 美国驻联合国人员

entry.def: If you say that a man is someone's man, you mean that he always supports that person or does what they want.

example.ex: At the time he was said to be very much Rajiv Gandhi's man.
example.tran: 据说他当时是拉吉夫·甘地的铁杆支持者。

entry.def: Some people refer to a woman's husband, lover, or boyfriend as her man .

example.ex: ...if they see your man cuddle you in the kitchen or living room.
example.tran: 假如他们看见你的男朋友在厨房或起居室里搂着你的话

entry.def: In the armed forces, the men are soldiers, sailors, marines, or airmen of lower  rank, as opposed to the officers.

example.ex: 150 officers and men had to be taken straight to hospital.
example.tran: 不得不将150名官兵直接送往了医院。

example.ex: ...a drill sergeant who would work with the men at least one hour every morning.
example.tran: 每天早晨至少和士兵操练一小时的操练中士

entry.tran: （尤指从事体力劳动或为上级工作的）男工，男雇员，男下属
entry.def: Male workers are sometimes referred to as men, especially if they do physical work or work for a more senior person.

example.ex: The men voted by a four-to-one majority to accept the pay offer...
example.tran: 男雇员以4比1的多数票接受了工资条件。

example.ex: After the talks, the leader of the Workers' Council said his men would be going back down the mines.
example.tran: 会谈之后，工人委员会的领袖说他手下的工人们会重回井下工作。

entry.tran: (对男子的称呼，表示生气或不耐烦)老兄，老弟，小伙子
entry.def: One man sometimes addresses another as 'man' when he is angry or impatient with him.

example.ex: I told you, man! It'll be sometime after eight o'clock.
example.tran: 老兄，我告诉过你了，时间是八点以后。

entry.tran: （在非正式场合中用以称呼男子）老弟,老兄
entry.def: In very informal social situations, man is sometimes used as a greeting or form of address to a man.

example.ex: Hey wow, man! Where d'you get those boots?
example.tran: 哎哟，老弟，哪里搞来的靴子？

entry.tran: 在…岗位上工作;操作(机器等)
entry.def: If you man something such as a place or machine, you operate it or are in charge of it.

example.ex: French soldiers manned roadblocks in the capital city.
example.tran: 法国士兵把守着首都的各路关卡。

example.ex: ...the person manning the phone at the complaints department...
example.tran: 投诉部的接线生

entry.def: If you say that a man is man enough to do something, you mean that he has the necessary courage or ability to do it.

example.ex: I told him that he should be man enough to admit he had done wrong...
example.tran: 我对他说，他应该勇于承认错误。

example.ex: You can search me if you think you're man enough.
example.tran: 有胆的话，你可以搜我的身。

entry.tran: 更受男人（而非女人）欢迎的男人
entry.def: If you describe a man as a man's man, you mean that he has qualities which make him popular with other men rather than with women.
People sometimes address a man as my man .

example.ex: 'Get the guy in the purple shirt.' — 'All right, my man.'
example.tran: “把那个穿紫衬衫的家伙叫过来。”——“好的，老兄。”

entry.tran: 我的老兄，我的老弟(对地位比自己低的人的友好称呼，但略带屈尊俯就之意)
entry.def: people sometimes address a man as my man ,my dear man, or my good man. This form of address is often friendly, but can also suggest that the speaker feels superior to the person being addressed.

example.ex: My dear man, you are welcome to stay...
example.tran: 我的老弟，欢迎你留下来。

example.ex: It's not for you to say so, my man!
example.tran: 你不该这么说，老弟！

entry.tran: 能自己做主;无须听命于他人
entry.def: If you say that a man is his own man, you approve of the fact that he makes his decisions and his plans himself, and does not depend on other people.

example.ex: Be your own man. Make up your own mind...
example.tran: 要有主见，你自己做主吧。

example.ex: He'll be his own man and won't be dictated to.
example.tran: 他要自己做决定，不会被他人左右。

entry.def: If you say that a group of men are, do, or think something to a man, you are emphasizing that every one of them is, does, or thinks that thing.

example.ex: To a man, the surveyors blamed the government...
example.tran: 调查员们无一例外地都指责政府。

example.ex: They died, to a man, when they tried to break out...
example.tran: 他们企图逃走的时候全都丢掉了性命。

entry.tran: 私下的;一对一的;开诚布公的
entry.def: A man-to-man conversation or meeting takes place between two men, especially two men who meet to discuss a serious personal matter.

example.ex: He called me to his office for a man-to-man talk...
example.tran: 他把我叫到他的办公室私下谈了谈。

example.ex: Me and Ben should sort this out man to man.
example.tran: 我和本应该把这件事坦率地说清楚。

means.word_mean: 1. an adult male person (as opposed to a woman);

sentences.sentence: "there were two women and six men on the bus"

means.word_mean: 2. someone who serves in the armed forces; a member of a military force;
3. the generic use of the word to refer to any human being;
4. all of the inhabitants of the earth;

sentences.sentence: "she always used `humankind' because `mankind' seemed to slight the women"

means.word_mean: 5. any living or extinct member of the family Hominidae

sentences.sentence: "the chief stationed two men outside the building"
"he awaited word from his man in Havana"

means.word_mean: 7. an adult male person who has a manly character (virile and courageous competent);

sentences.sentence: "the army will make a man of you"

means.word_mean: 8. a male person who plays a significant role (husband or lover or boyfriend) in the life of a particular woman;

sentences.sentence: "she takes good care of her man"

means.word_mean: 9. a manservant who acts as a personal attendant to his employer;
10. game equipment consisting of an object used in playing certain board games;

sentences.sentence: "he taught me to set up the men on the chess board"
"he sacrificed a piece to get a strategic advantage"

means.word_mean: 1. take charge of a certain job; occupy a certain work place;

sentences.sentence: "Mr. Smith manned the reception desk in the morning"

example.en: This is my man Sam, who's gonna show you how to dance.
example.zh: 这位是我的搭档山姆，他将示范给你们看如何跳舞。

list.explanation: (在劫案或骗局中作里应外合的)内线人物

example.en: Sam had been an inside man who was involved in a robbery.
example.zh: 山姆参与了一桩抢劫案，他是个内线人物。

list.explanation: (监狱用语)善于拍马、谄媚的犯人
(黑人用语)无足轻重的人，不值得重视的人

example.en: He seems like a man with a paper ass to me; don't pay him any attention.
example.zh: 在我看来，他没有什么了不起的，你不必理会他。

example.en: Lou Reed,he is my main man.
example.zh: 卢.里德，我最要好的朋友。

example.en: He's been her main man for two years. Do you think they'll get married?
example.zh: 他是她的情人有两年了。你认为他们会结婚吗？

list.explanation: (表示赞赏、鼓励的感叹语)太棒了!干得好! Go-man-go! She's just full of jazz.太棒了!她真的浑身是劲儿。
[黑社会用语](替作案罪犯当外围警戒)望风者

auth_sentence.content: We were waved through and out into a no-man's-land.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were waved through and out into a no-man's-land.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were waved through and out into a no-man's-land.

auth_sentence.content: Kerrison is the man who makes sense of it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kerrison is the man who makes sense of it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kerrison is the man who makes sense of it.

auth_sentence.content: He was a family man and a true gentleman.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a family man and a true gentleman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a family man and a true gentleman.

abbreviation.mean_cn: 手册，指南，细则，人工(的)，手控(的)
制造，加工，制造业，工业，制造品，产品

Sentence.sentence: In 1955 Time's Man of the Year was Harlow Curtice, the boss of GM.
In March its chief executive was fired by Time's current Man of the Year, Mr Obama
The Unemployed Man and His Family, described a family in which the husband initially reacted to losing his job "with tireless search for work.

sentences.en: Mike is a man of charm and cultivation.
sentences.cn: 迈克是一个既有魅力又有教养的男子。

sentences.en: Growing old is something a man has to accept.
sentences.cn: 逐渐衰老是任何人都得承认的事实。

sentences.en: Man has been trying to control nature.
sentences.cn: 人类一直在努力控制自然。
鼓起勇气, 应付当前危机。

jushi.english: He is a man of great influence in this town.
jushi.chinese: 他在这个镇上是很有影响力的人。

jushi.english: Ask the men to come in,but not the boys or women.
jushi.chinese: 请男人们进来,不要请男孩或者女人们。

jushi.english: The moon is our nearest neighbour in space and men have visited it already.
jushi.chinese: 月球在宇宙中是我们最近的邻居,人类已在它上面留下过足迹。
